errors.password_length: Password should include at least 8 characters

login.title: Sign in
login.card_title: Continue right where you left off.
login.link: Already have an account? Sign In

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.text:
Your name will only be exposed to yourself.
Your email address serves as the primary contact option and is used to sign into citrus.

account.title: Your Account
account.card_text: Deleting your account is permanent and irreversible.

confirm_modal.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirm_modal.text: You will be signed out and your account will be deleted permanently.

today.title: Today
today.description: Track your meals on a daily basis.

empty.title: No Meals
empty.subtitle: Add your first meal for the day!

dishes.title: Dishes
dishes.description: Get an overview of all your dishes.

empty.title: No Dishes
empty.subtitle: Create your first dish and get started!

general.title: General Information
general.text:
Please provide general information about the dish you want to add.
The default portion size is the amount of grams or mililiters you usually consume the dish (e.g. 1 Banana = 120 g).

ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.text:
A dish consists of a list of ingredients.
Please add some ingredients to your dish.
Based on these specifications the associated calorie value as well as the macronutrients will be calculated.

empty.title: No Ingredients
empty.subtitle: Add an ingredient to get started.

groceries.title: Groceries
groceries.description: Get an overview of all your groceries.

empty.title: No Groceries
empty.subtitle: Create your first grocery and get started!

general.title: General Information
general.text:
Please provide general information about the grocery you want to add.
The default portion size is the amount of grams or mililiters you usually consume the grocery (e.g. 1 Banana = 120 g).

macros.title: Macronutrients
macros.text:
Macronutrients consist of carbohydrates, fats and proteins.
Please provide these macronutrients per 100 g/ml. Based on these specifications the associated calorie value will be calculated.

landing.title: A <0>healthier diet</0> by keeping track of your daily meals
landing.subtitle: Track your daily meals with ease - citrus allows you to create dishes by combining different groceries and ultimately track these meals on a daily basis.

dark_mode.title: Dark mode
dark_mode.description: Switch between light and dark mode whenever you wish! All parts of the application are designed to support both modes.

intuitive_forms.title: Intuitive Forms
intuitive_forms.description: Add, update or delete groceries and dishes quickly by filling out intuitive forms.

mobile_support.title: Mobile Support
mobile_support.description: Track your meals on your desktop or when you're on the go! All parts of the application are designed to work on both desktop and mobile environments.

diary_entry_addition.title: Meal Diary Entry Addition Error
diary_entry_addition.message: Meal Diary Entry could not be added.

diary_entry_update.title: Meal Diary Entry Update Error
diary_entry_update.message: Meal Diary Entry could not be updated.

diary_entry_deletion.title: Meal Diary Entry Deletion Error
diary_entry_deletion.message: Meal Diary Entry could not be deleted.

diary_entry_addition.title: Meal Diary Entry added
diary_entry_addition.message: Meal Diary Entry was added succesfully.

diary_entry_update.title: Meal Diary Entry updated
diary_entry_update.message: Meal Diary Entry was updated successfully.

diary_entry_deletion.title: Meal Diary Entry deleted
diary_entry_deletion.message: Meal Diary Entry was deleted successfully.

groceries.title: No groceries yet
groceries.description: Add your first grocery to get started.

dishes.title: No dishes yet
dishes.description: Add your first dish to get started tracking your diet.
